Text: Teiji Ito (伊藤貞司 , Itō Teiji , January 22, 1935 – August 16, 1982) was a Japanese composer and performer.

Triplets:<Teiji Ito
1:
--------------------
Text: Teiji Ito:  He is best known for his scores for the avant-garde films by Maya Deren.

2:
<Text: Teiji Ito:  The independent filmmaker, Barbara Hammer, continues to promote and educate the world about both Teiji and his wife, Maya Deren.>
